title: You Don't Have to Be a Victim of Your Struggles | Sadie Robertson Huff and Ben Stuart
description:
Ben Stuart joins Sadie to discuss his new book, “Rest & War,” a field guide for spiritual life. Listen in for encouragement on how to shut down shame, stop beating yourself up, and learn to struggle well through the challenges of this life. Friends, you are not doomed by your most negative thoughts and difficult struggles. Know that God has a purpose for you, and there is a path forward. 
-
